casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Slagle, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Slagle (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 509.]

(No. 94-2207 Submitted April 18, 1995 Decided July 19, 1995.) *510Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney,, and Karen L. Johnson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. David H. Bodiker, Ohio Public Defender, Linda E. Prucha and Pamela Prude-Smithers, Assistant Public Defenders, for appellant. Per Curiam.

We affirm the decision of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its opinion.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
